original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū satthapāṇissa dhammaṁ desenti …pe….
“Na satthapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṁ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: ▁na ▁sa ttha pāṇ issa ▁a gilān assa ▁dhammaṃ ▁des essāmīti ▁sikkhā ▁ karaṇīy āti
▁ekato dhār aṃ ▁ubhato dhār aṃ ▁pa haraṇ aṃ
▁na ▁sa ttha pāṇ issa ▁a gilān assa ▁dhammo ▁des etabbo

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca satthapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṁ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: ▁yo ▁anādar iyaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁sa ttha pāṇ issa ▁a gilān assa ▁dhammaṃ ▁des eti ▁āpatti ▁dukkaṭassa
